titles.title: Customs De Minimis Adjustment Act of 2010
To amend the Tariff Act of 1930 relating to de minimis entries.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/25/2010--Introduced. Customs De Minimis Adjustment Act of 2010 - Amends the Tariff Act of 1930 to increase from $200 to $1,000 the value of articles that may be imported duty-free into the United States by one person on one day.
